chunk:
Untoxicated Blank Slate Micellar Water

Brand: Untoxicated

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water (Solvent)
Glycerin (Moisturizer)
Ceramide AP (Moisturizer)
Ceramide EOP (Moisturizer)
Ceramide NP (Moisturizer)
Glycolipids (Conditioner)
Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate (Cleanser)
Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate (Cleanser)
Phenoxyethanol (Preservative)
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
